title: Santander to close 44 branches and put 291 jobs at risk
full_text: Santander to close 44 branches and put 291 jobs at risk. The high-street lender is the latest to announce a swathe of branch closures.. "We will continue to invest in both our branch network - comprising of full-service branches, counter-free branches, reduced-hour branches, Santander Locals, and our increasingly popular work cafes -… [+138 chars]
